Html:
Hi,

first of all thanks for this amazing tool! I have been creating my own stylesheet during the last few days and I am stumped on how to justify text in the bibliography. <halign>justify</halign> does not work and inserting HTML did not solve my problem either. And ideas?

Thanks in advance!

Set the bibliography paragraph style to justify in Word, not in the stylesheet.

See http://bibword.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Styles_FAQ&referringTitle=Documentation#Q12
